name: Donald Kozlowski
story: Having grown up in a poor family, Mialosz turned to petty crime at a young age to make ends meet. He quickly found a talent for theft and became known in his neighborhood as a skilled thief. Eventually, he graduated to more serious crimes and became involved with a local gang. Now, he works as a thief and enforcer for them, using his experiences on the battlefield to intimidate rivals and eliminate threats. While he makes good money, he's always on the lookout for his next big score, and is never content to rest on his laurels.
